channel.title: Warlock 999's Renamed Base V2 - Anim and gfx ready!
channel.description:
Well I made V2 For my friend Gary. So I figured why release it for everyone else.
[u][b]New in V2:[/b][/u] Item Ready (Add ints under "add ints here" in itemdef.java) Models Preloaded (Add Models in .dat format in Model folder in cache) Custom Graphics Ready(Look in spotanim to figure out how to load new graphics) Custom Animation Ready with SWAT's New Loader(Look in Animation.java) Scroll Removed(To enable it uncomment frame.getContentPane().add(scroll, BorderLayout.SOUTH); in Jframe.java) 317 Censor System Added back Fixed a few bugs
[u][b]Media:[/b][/u]
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=14n2paq&s=4 - New RS Bgs Spec
[u][b]Download:[/b][/u] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wzdjozuodoi]MediaFire[/url]
[b][u][shadow=red,left]Please Comment <3[/shadow][/u][/b]

item.title: Warlock 999's Renamed Base V2 - Anim and gfx ready!
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

[quote=“Treber, post:9, topic:309909”][quote author=warlock 999 link=topic=406344.msg3004069#msg3004069 date=1256243486]
Thanks guys
[/quote]

Did it take you much time to create this?[/quote]
bout 30 mins from my 1st release base. It took a while to make my first base. like a week

Read full topic

item.title: Warlock 999's Renamed Base V2 - Anim and gfx ready!
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

Well I made V2 For my friend Gary. So I figured why release it for everyone else.

New in V2:
Item Ready (Add ints under “add ints here” in itemdef.java)
Models Preloaded (Add Models in .dat format in Model folder in cache)
Custom Graphics Ready(Look in spotanim to figure out how to load new graphics)
Custom Animation Ready with SWAT’s New Loader(Look in Animation.java)
Scroll Removed(To enable it uncomment frame.getContentPane().add(scroll, BorderLayout.SOUTH); in Jframe.java)
317 Censor System Added back
Fixed a few bugs

Media:

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=14n2paq&s=4 - New RS Bgs Spec

Download:
MediaFire

[shadow=red,left]Please Comment <3[/shadow]
